hero_sub: We deliver job-specific programs that increase productivity, foster collaboration, and unlock people's potential with real conversations and measurable progress.
history_p1: Since our early days, we've supported learners in more than 150 countries with live coaching from certified teachers and role-specific courses. Our approach bridges soft and technical skill gaps so teams can communicate, collaborate, and thrive.
history_p2: Today we're remote-first and globally distributed. We keep improving the craft—refining our curriculum, growing our community of tutors, and building tools that make progress inevitable.
values_subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
value1_desc: Impact starts with understanding. We balance compassion with pragmatic thinking to make decisions that align with our mission.
value2_desc: We foster transparency, ask the right questions, and embrace constructive dialogue to deliver outcomes that matter.
value3_desc: Everyone holds the wheel. We approach obstacles with purpose, hold ourselves accountable, and focus on results.
value4_desc: Different viewpoints lead to better solutions. We break down barriers so learners and teams can achieve their goals.
life_p1: We're a remote dream team across multiple time zones. Despite the distance, we stay closely connected, collaborate effectively, and show up for each other and our learners.
life_p2: Diversity is our strength—we bring different perspectives to the table and stay united in the mission to break down language barriers.
timeline1_text: Speexify starts as a small tutoring collective focused on real-world English.
timeline2_text: Launched 24/7 scheduling and a global tutor network.
timeline3_text: Expanded corporate programs with role-specific learning paths.
timeline4_text: Introduced AI-assisted practice to personalize every session.
leaders_subtitle: The team driving our vision forward
testi1_quote: Speexify sharpened our team's business English and saved hours each week. Practical, flexible, and effective.
testi2_quote: We saw remarkable improvement within weeks. The blend of live coaching and targeted content exceeded expectations.
testi3_quote: Speexify's structure makes it easy to satisfy different learning styles across our organization.
testi4_quote: Adoption was smooth and impact was fast. Highly recommended for business communication.
cta_text: Help us build the most effective, human-centered language learning platform in the world.
offer_subtitle: Built for individuals and teams — designed for measurable progress
offer_card1_text: Personalized coaching to improve speaking confidence, comprehension, and real-life communication.
offer_card2_text: Role-specific programs that strengthen collaboration, meetings, presentations, and customer communication.
offer_card3_text: Online, hybrid, and customized training formats designed around your learners and goals.
digital_only_note: All Speexify services are delivered digitally (online coaching and platform access). No physical goods are shipped.
offer_card4_text: Clear progress tracking, practical assessments, and communication results you can measure.
